name: Nokia Plant VS Zombies
description:
This Game Was Made For The Nokia 3310 Jam
------------------------------------------
The Game Is Only Playabe In Full Screen!

Controls:
Move - WSAD / Arrow Keys

Interact - Space / Insert
------------------------------------------
You Are The Only Human That Hasen't Been Eaten By A Zomibe! The Only One That Can Protect You Is Your Plants. Be Careful! Also Let Not Die Okay?
